pages.text: $(l)(Active-Defensive)/$$(br)Deployables are deployed on your own board $(l)on unknown tiles/$. They act like any other ship and can even have abilities, but the opponent does not have to destroy them to win the game.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Try to place deployables in smart spots. If it has an active ability, then place it somewhere where you think the opponent won't easily find it. If it has a passive ability that you want the opponent to trigger, then place it somewhere where it's easy for the opponent to find it.

$(li)Deployables must be placed on unknown tiles, meaning that any tile that has already been damaged is not valid. $(l)If you ignore this and still try to place it on a known tile, then the game will try to relocate it to a random spot.$(li)If there are no valid spots for the deployable, then the spent energy will be refunded.
